data.title: Pentomino Code
data.statement:
In the book Chasing Vermeer by Blue Balliett, there is a pentomino code where a combination of a pentomino letter and a number corresponds to a letter in the alphabet.
Here is the code:
{{
```
   1 2 3
F| A M Y
I| B N Z
L| C O
N| D P
P| E Q
T| F R
U| G S
V| H T
W| I U
X| J V
Y| K W
Z| L X
```
}}
Find the pentomino code for a given string of capital letters where each "letter" is separated by a space, and a space is replaced with a "-". There should be no trailing spaces.
Example: AB is F:1 I:1
Another example: A B is F:1 - I:1

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: NO FREE MAN SHALL BE SEIZED IMPRISONED DISPOSSESSED OUTLAWED EXILED OR RUINED IN ANY WAY

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: NOR IN ANY WAY PROCEEDED AGAINST EXCEPT BY THE LAWFUL JUDGEMENT OF HIS PEERS AND THE LAW OF THE LAND

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: WE HOLD THESE TRUTHS TO BE SELFEVIDENT THAT ALL MEN ARE CREATED EQUAL THAT THEY ARE ENDOWED BY THEIR CREATOR WITH CERTAIN INALIENABLE RIGHTS AMONG THESE ARE LIFE LIBERTY AND THE PURSUIT OF HAPPINESS

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: CONGRESS SHALL MAKE NO LAW RESPECTING AN ESTABLISHMENT OF RELIGION OR PROHIBITING THE FREE EXERCISE THEREOF OR ABRIDGING THE FREEDOM OF SPEECH OR OF THE PRESS OR THE RIGHT OF THE PEOPLE PEACEABLY TO ASSEMBLE AND TO PETITION THE GOVERNMENT FOR A REDRESS OF GRIEVANCES

data.stubGenerator:
read s:string(500)
write The coded message
data.inputDescription: <<1 Line:>> A string [[s]], all capital letters and/or spaces

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the book Chasing Vermeer by Blue Balliett, there is a pentomino code where a combination of a pentomino letter and a number corresponds to a letter in the alphabet.
Here is the code:


   1 2 3
F| A M Y
I| B N Z
L| C O
N| D P
P| E Q
T| F R
U| G S
V| H T
W| I U
X| J V
Y| K W
Z| L X


Find the pentomino code for a given string of capital letters where each "letter" is separated by a space, and a space is replaced with a "-". There should be no trailing spaces.
Example: AB is F:1 I:1
Another example: A B is F:1 - I:1




   

      
Input

      
1 Line: A string s, all capital letters and/or spaces

   

   

      
Output

      
1 Line: A string coded with the pentomino key

   

   

      
Constraints

      
1 ≤ length of s ≤ 500

   

   

      
Example

      

         

            
Input

            
AB

         

         

            
Output

            
F:1 I:1
